titles.title: Baby Box and Maternal Assistance Act of 2019

To amend title V of the Social Security Act to allow the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to States under the Maternal and Child Health Care Program for purposes of establishing Baby Box Programs.
Baby Box and Maternal Assistance Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Baby Box and Maternal Assistance Act of 2019 This bill provides grants to states for the provision of training, services, and items that support prenatal, newborn, and postpartum care.
